faqs.question: Is Balvenie Tun 1401 valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tun 1401 is considered one of the best whiskies Balvenie ever produced and is highly valuable, especially early batches.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 21 Year PortWood?
faqs.answer: We buy older bottlings of the 21 Year PortWood. Current standard releases are purchased only as part of a collection.

faqs.question: Do you buy Balvenie 17 Year?
faqs.answer: Yes, since the 17 Year range (DoubleWood, Peated Cask, Rum Cask) was discontinued, we actively buy these bottles.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 15 Year Single Barrel?
faqs.answer: We buy the older Single Barrel releases (both the original Bourbon cask and the Sherry cask versions).

faqs.question: What is the DCS Compendium?
faqs.answer: This is a series of single cask releases honoring Malt Master David C. Stewart. They are highly collectible and valuable.

faqs.question: How do I ship a Balvenie 30/40?
faqs.answer: These come in heavy presentation boxes. We recommend shipping the bottle and box separately in the same package if the fit is loose.
